      • BUNDLE_MERCHANT_INFO

        public static final java.lang.String BUNDLE_MERCHANT_INFO
        Parcelable extra - MerchantInfo object. Required always. Contains the merchant ID and the flag if test or production environment is used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUNDLE_ORDER_INFO

      • BUNDLE_COMPLETE_RESULT

        public static final java.lang.String BUNDLE_COMPLETE_RESULT
        Parcelable Extra - PiaResult object. This key is used by the SDK to return the result back to the application. Use this KEY to retrieve extras from Intent in your OnActivityResult method
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int PIA_SDK_REQUEST
        Request code used when starting the SDK. In your onActivityResult check for this code

      • start

        public void start(android.app.Activity activity,
                  android.os.Bundle bundle,
                  RegisterPaymentHandler handler)
        Starts the main activity of the SDK. It is started with startActivityForResult and the request Code is PIA_SDK_REQUEST
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity from where the SDK is started.
        bundle - Bundle parameters needed to start the activity.
        handler - Register Payment handler.

      • getRegisterPaymentHandler

        public RegisterPaymentHandler getRegisterPaymentHandler()

      • initiateMobileWallet

        public static boolean initiateMobileWallet(PaymentProcess.WalletPayment walletPayment,
                                           boolean showProgressIndicator,
                                           WalletPaymentRegistration paymentRegistration)
        Attempts to initiate MobilePay payment and returns *true* if successful. Returns *false* if MobilePay is not installed; Lead user to a different payment method.
        Parameters:
        showProgressIndicator - True to show PiaSDK's standard progress indicator
        paymentRegistration - Object handling payment registration with `WalletURL` callback Note: Callback with `null` if registration is unsuccessful.

      • initiateMobileWallet

        public static boolean initiateMobileWallet(PaymentProcess.WalletPayment walletPayment,
                                           WalletPaymentRegistration paymentRegistration)
        Attempts to initiate MobilePay payment and returns *true* if successful. Returns *false* if MobilePay is not installed; Lead user to a different payment method.
        Parameters:
        paymentRegistration - Object handling payment registration with `WalletURL` callback Note: Callback with `null` if registration is unsuccessful.

      • willHandleRedirectWithIntent

        public static boolean willHandleRedirectWithIntent(android.content.Intent intent,
                                                   MobileWalletListener activityMobileWalletListener)
        Returns *true* if the intent belongs to PiaSDK redirect. The [listener] will be notified
